sourcing.instructions: - Aluminum Oxide: Obtain from chemical supply stores or online platforms.
steps: - Aluminum Oxide: Obtain from chemical supply stores or online platforms.
1. Measure out 160 g of Aluminum Oxide, 40 g of Terbium Oxide, and 60 g of Titanium Dioxide.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Measure out 160 g of Aluminum Oxide, 40 g of Terbium Oxide, and 60 g of Titanium Dioxide.

steps: 1. Preheat a kiln or furnace to 1200째C (2192째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat a kiln or furnace to 1200째C (2192째F).

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the kiln and allow it to cool naturally.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the kiln and allow it to cool naturally.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the block from the kiln.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the block from the kiln.
